name: Candy-ultra-block-saga
tagline: Game created with 3 others developers, 1 sound designer and 3 graphic designers at the Global Game Jam 2014. It need one Leap Motion and up to 4 Xbox gamepad.
body: Game created at the Global Game Jam 2014 : [http://globalgamejam.org/2014/jam-sites/global-game-jam-paris-isart-digital](http://globalgamejam.org/2014/jam-sites/global-game-jam-paris-isart-digital)
